1.text: Hold a can of beer horizontally.

2.text: Position the hole 1 in (2.5 cm) from the bottom of the can.

3.text: Tilt the can until you feel an air bubble under your thumb.

4.text: Use a key or knife to puncture the can easily.

5.text: Push confidently with your thumb if you don’t have a tool.

6.text: Make the hole the size of a dime.

7.text: Place your mouth over the hole.

8.text: Tilt the can to a vertical position.

9.text: Pop the tab open with your other hand.

10.text: Drink the beer as fast as you can.
